availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Elvira A. Cartwright Key (Fayette County, KY, resident)

body.p: Fayette County, Kentucky, resident. Daughter of James A. Cartwright and Adeline Graves Cartwright. Married to Robert J. Key in Clark County, Kentucky, on September 29, 1853. Mother of Mary "Molly" E. Key and Lou Belle Key. Resident in Caldwell County in 1850. Resident in Fayette County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 361B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, District 1, p. 508.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, District 1, p. 4B.
